name: WashingtonDCMetro
0:
”Alexa, open d. c. metro”
”What are the delays on the metro”
”How do i get from McLean to Crystal City”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: d. c. metro
des:
Lets the user know if there are any alerts on the Washington DC metro or Washington DC metro buses. Invoked by saying "Alexa, open D. C. metro"



==== Metro Arrivals ====

User: "Alexa, open D. C. metro"
Alexa: "Welcome to the unoffical D.C. Metro Alexa App. What can I help you with?"
User: "What are the next arrivals for McLean"
Alexa: ~provides the user with the upcoming metro train arrivals~

====================

==== Metro Directions ====

User: "Alexa, open D. C. metro"
Alexa: "Welcome to the unoffical D.C. Metro Alexa App. What can I help you with?"
User: "How do i get from McLean to Crystal City"
Alexa: ~provides the user with live step by step directions on how to get from station to destination station~

======================

==== Metro time/fare from one station to another =====

User: "Alexa, open D. C. metro"
Alexa: "Welcome to the unoffical D.C. Metro Alexa App. What can I help you with?"
User: "How long will it take to get from McLean to Crystal City"
Alexa: ~provides the user with live travel time and fare~

==============================================

==== Metro Alerts ====

User: "Alexa, open D. C. metro"
Alexa: "Welcome to the unoffical D.C. Metro Alexa App. What can I help you with?"
User: "What are the delays on the metro?"
Alexa: ~provides the user with live metro alerts~

=================

==== Bus Alerts ====

User: "Alexa, open D. C. metro"
Alexa: "Welcome to the unoffical D.C. Metro Alexa App. What can I help you with?"
User: "What are the delays on the bus?"
Alexa: ~provides the user with live bus alerts~

=================


==== Other Sayings ====
-Tell me the metro delays
-Tell me the metro alerts
-What are the delays on the metro
-What are the alerts o the metro.

-Tell me the bus delays
-Tell me the bus alerts
-What are the delays on the bus
-What are the alerts on the bus
====================
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
